video.title: Being Mary Jane: The Series
video.synopsis: Ambitious single TV journalist Mary Jane attempts to balance her career with her overbearing family and an increasingly messy love life.

episodes.synopsis: Mary Jane has it all: style, class and a high-powered career. She's there for her family and folks on her TV show. But she's missing one thing: love.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Andre drops by while David is at Mary Jane's house, and the firing of a news anchor at SNC gets everyone wondering what's next.
episodes.title: Storm Advisory

episodes.synopsis: Mary Jane questions whether Andre should be in her future, and she and Kara have creative differences over a revamp of Mark's show.
episodes.title: Girls Night In

episodes.synopsis: Patrick takes Mary Jane to their Aunt Toni for advice when he learns of her affair with Andre, which forces her to honestly assess the relationship.
episodes.title: The Huxtables Have Fallen

episodes.synopsis: When Andre mistakenly reveals that he is still intimate with his wife, Mary Jane gets even by going on a date with a man she met online.
episodes.title: Mixed Messages

episodes.synopsis: Mary Jane and Andre move in together. Later, Mary Jane runs into her ex David at a gala, where Helen is disappointed with Paul Sr.'s status.
episodes.title: Exposed

episodes.synopsis: Mary Jane and Andre's relationship stumbles when Andre accuses Mary Jane of still seeing David, and Paul Jr. runs afoul of the authorities.
episodes.title: Hindsight Is 20/40

episodes.synopsis: After a colleague commits suicide, Mary Jane ends up in a scandal, and Niecy worries that her unborn child's father won't be there for the birth.
episodes.title: Blindsided

episodes.synopsis: After Mary Jane decides David is the man for her -- and loses friends over him -- he rejects her because of another woman.
episodes.title: Uber Love

episodes.synopsis: With David's new girlfriend pregnant, Mary Jane throws a dinner party for old friends and reflects on the direction of her life.
episodes.title: People in Glass Houses Shouldn't Throw Fish

episodes.synopsis: Mark asks Mary Jane to pose as his girlfriend when his parents come for a visit, and Mary Jane interviews a teen sex worker.
episodes.title: Freedom

episodes.synopsis: Mary Jane volunteers for fertility treatment for a segment on the show. Meanwhile, she takes Niecy under her wing and tries to land a big interview.
episodes.title: Mary Jane Knows Best

episodes.synopsis: Niecy keeps her distance from Treyvion's father when he comes home from college, and Kara shields Mary Jane from negative feedback about the show.
episodes.title: Sleepless in Atlanta

episodes.synopsis: Mary Jane gets a surprise during a live broadcast of the show, and Niecy ponders letting Cameron back into her life.
episodes.title: No Eggspectations

episodes.synopsis: Hoping to boost her chances of getting pregnant, Mary Jane gets a treatment that wreaks havoc on her hormones. Meanwhile, she nabs a big interview.
episodes.title: Pulling the Trigger

episodes.synopsis: Mary Jane reveals her surprising reasons for sleeping with David, and tensions over the show jeopardize her relationship with Kara.
episodes.title: Let's Go Crazy

episodes.synopsis: A tragic school shooting hits the show's staff hard, Mary Jane and Sheldon take things to the next level, and Mark and Eric's relationship ends.
episodes.title: One Is the Loneliest Number

episodes.synopsis: Mary Jane struggles with an important career decision after being nominated for an Emmy. Meanwhile, Patrick learns what happened to Tracy.
episodes.title: Line in the Sand

episodes.synopsis: Mary Jane and Kara get an unexpected shot at taking the reins of a prime-time news hour, and Mary Jane gets a surprise concerning Sheldon.
episodes.title: Primetime

episodes.synopsis: Kara goes home to address a tangled family situation, and Mary Jane's angry rant goes viral and opens up doors for her -- but at a cost.
episodes.title: Reading the Signs

episodes.synopsis: Mary Jane steps into a prime-time slot at the network. Meanwhile, she gets shocking news about David just as she and Sheldon settle down.
episodes.title: Signing Off
